Summary: hovering over mountain top. Other truckers saw it and commented
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving tractor and trailer sounth in PA. Looked up and saw object hovering over mountain top. About that time other Truckers where heard on CB chatting about seeing the same thing. The object was quite a distance away but was still very visible. So actual size was very big. Not sure exact location however it was close to the Allegheny Tunnel.
